#text=I noticed my hair was getting very long and needed to get a trim .
#text=My previous haircut was done very poorly at what I thought it would be a decent place .
#text=I looked up other nearby barbers by doing a google search for them in my zip code .
#text=I ended up choosing one place I used to frequent in the past and knew to be reliable .
#text=I drove over to the barber and entered the store .
#text=It was during a non-busy hour so when I entered they immediately asked me to come to the account register .
#text=I gave them some basic info about me and was sat down in a chair .
#text=They asked me what style I would like and I told them I wanted to have a look similar to a celebrity I knew .
#text=It was an unusual style so instead I ended up taking their recommendation .
#text=The haircut did n't take long at all .
#text=And after I got out of my chair , I headed over to the register again and paid .
